name: js-modular-seed
description: javascript seed project that supports a modular code base

scripts.clean:full: shx ls -d app-*/ lib/*/ | bulk -c "shx rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.clean: shx ls -d app-*/ lib/*/ | bulk -c "npm run clean"
scripts.postinstall: shx ls -d app-*/ lib/*/ | bulk -c "npm install" && shx ls -d app-*/ | bulk -c "linklocal -r"

author: christianacca
